DbDetails.DbTable: mes_trace.pallet_transaction p LEFT JOIN mes_trace.pallet p0 ON p.pallet_id=p0.pallet_id LEFT JOIN mes_trace.inv_lot_number i ON p.inv_lot_number_id=i.inv_lot_number_id JOIN mes_trace.inv_transaction it ON (it.status and it.inv_transaction_id=p.inv_transaction_id) JOIN mes_trace.item itm ON itm.item_id_m=it.item_id_m JOIN mes_trace.wip_wo_bom wb ON (it.reference_key_name='wip_wo_bom' AND it.reference_key_value=wb.wip_wo_bom_id) JOIN mes_trace.wip_wo_header wo ON (wo.wip_wo_header_id=wb.wip_wo_header_id) JOIN mes_trace.item wi ON (wi.item_id_m=wo.item_id_m) JOIN mes_trace.wip_wo_routing_line wrl ON (wb.wip_wo_header_id=wrl.wip_wo_header_id AND wb.routing_sequence=wrl.routing_sequence AND wb.routing_seq_num=wrl.routing_seq_num) JOIN mes_trace.bom_standard_operation bso ON bso.bom_standard_operation_id=wrl.standard_operation_id

DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where transaction_type_id=%{transtype} and (p.created_by='%{operaid}' or %{role_id}=1) %{where} order by pallet_transaction_id desc limit %{StartRow},%{PgSize}

SELECT if(mes_trace.pallet_trans(%{pallet_transaction_vLst[pallet_id]},%{pallet_transaction_vLst[item_id_m]},%{pallet_transaction_vLst[inv_lot_number_id]},%{transtype},'%{pallet_transaction_vLst[document_type]}','%{pallet_transaction_vLst[document_number]}',if('%{role_id}'=1,-%{pallet_transaction_vLst[pallet_quantity]},0), 'inv_transaction','%{pallet_transaction_vLst[inv_transaction_id]}','%{operaid}','') is not null,'OK','Fail') as cancel;
